import React from "react"; import Header from '../Header' import Projects from '../Projects' import About from '../About' import { ScrollContainer, ScrollPage, Animator, batch, Fade, FadeIn, Move, MoveIn, MoveOut, Sticky, StickyIn, ZoomIn } from 'react-scroll-motion' import './index.css' import { TiSocialLinkedin } from 'react-icons/ti' import {FiMail, FiGithub} from 'react-icons/fi' const Home = () => { const ZoomInScrollOut = batch(StickyIn(), FadeIn(), ZoomIn()) const handleContactClick = (url) =>{ const win = window.open(url, '_blank') win.focus() } return (
{/* section 2 */} {/* section 3 */} {/* section 4 */}
conatact
{/* linkedin link */}
handleContactClick('https://www.linkedin.com/in/lina-ova/')} >

Polina Nazarova

 {/* github link */}
handleContactClick('https://github.com/lina-ova')} >

lina-ova

 {/* mail */}
handleContactClick('mailto:polina.w.nazarova@helsinki.fi')} >

polina.w.nazarova@helsinki.fi
) } export default Home;
